attributes.action: Replace parliament governed by mps and politicians with a system that allows the people to make the decisions via a process of regular referendums
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dissolve parliament and replace the current governance of the country by mps and politicians with a system that allows the people to make the decisions via a process of regular referendums with a small number of civil servants to deal with the administrative details.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
